title: Champion
description: Danny Champion is ready to be a rockstar. He's been preparing for this most of his life. He'll finally make it with the Knights. He knows it.It's a horrible time to fall in love.But then there's Cash, Danny’s roommate. A quiet computer nerd without a clue about the music business, Cash can barely understand the world Danny's so eager to live in. He certainly doesn’t want to share it.Even though he knows he shouldn't, Danny's unable to resist introducing Cash to the wonders of sex. He didn't expect to get addicted to Cash's charms.
author: Jet Mykles
